response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. This is a special price considering the exceptional quality and rarity of the product. I believe that with your appreciation for such items, you would find this offer compelling. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
